duties_responsibilities.duty: Direct the daily operational activities of the clinical laboratory, ensuring both technical and non-technical operations are running efficiently.
Manage the staffing, training, and mentoring of laboratory supervisors, ensuring adequate coverage and smooth workflow.
Ensure the diagnostics laboratory meets market-leading service levels, complies with regulatory requirements, and resolves client inquiries and operational issues effectively.
Develop and implement laboratory procedures, installation of equipment and methods, and maintain a clean and safe work environment.
Conduct departmental meetings, communicate effectively with leadership, clients, and staff, and maintain technical knowledge in the assigned department.
Investigate deviations from established procedures and ensure effective corrective action, and handle the physical requirements of the position.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Biology, Chemistry, Clinical Laboratory Science, or Medical Technology (Master's preferred)
